article.title: Defense Agency Awards Raytheon Up to $155 Million Contract to Develop an Interoperable Network Gateway
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company has been awarded a contract by the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency to provide a cost-effective, highly capable military wireless network interoperable gateway. The contract provides Raytheon $24.4 million for one year; options would extend the contract and bring the potential value to $155 million.
